channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Build Step Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Build Step Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-25184|2024-08-03T04:36:06.364Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20build%20step%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Build Step Plugin 2.15 and earlier reveals password parameter default values when generating a pipeline script using the Pipeline Snippet Generator, allowing attackers with Item/Read permission to retrieve the default password parameter value from jobs.
